Package shared.messages

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionMessage
    A message containing all actions a player wants to execute
    CreatePartyMessage
    A message that is send to the server to indicate the player wants to create a new party
    GameUpdateMessage
    This class can be used to verify the connection between the client and server.
    JoinPartyMessage
    This message is sent to the server containing the id of the party the player sending the message wants to join
    LeavePartyMessage  
    Message
    Instances of this class are sent between the server and the client, providing getType method and ensuring all classes that are sent are of valid types
    PartyJoinedMessage  
    PlayerInfoMessage
    This class can be used to send a new name for a player to the server.
    ReadyMessage
    Used to send to the server if the player is ready in lobby or not.
    StartGameMessage
    Message sent to server when the master of a party wants to start a game
